metadata.title: CVE-2024-56567 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ad7780: fix division by zero in ad7780_write_raw()In the ad7780_write_raw() , val2 can be zero, which might lead to adivision by zero error in DIV_ROUND_CLOSEST(). The ad7780_write_raw()is based on iio_info's write_raw. While val is explicitly declared thatcan be zero (in read mode), val2 is not specified to be non-zero.
